item.title: Achieving Optimal Clustering in Gaussian Mixture Models with Anisotropic Covariance Structures
item.description: This research develops rate-optimal clustering algorithms for Gaussian Mixture Models with anisotropic covariance structures, bridging the gap between theoretical guarantees and practical efficiency.

item.title: The Road Less Scheduled
item.description: Revolutionizing machine learning, Schedule-Free optimization achieves state-of-the-art results without needing learning rate schedules, simplifying training and improving efficiency.
